SELECT T01.PRODUCT_NUM /* 상품번호*/ , T01.USER_NUM /* 등록사용자번호*/ , T01.PRODUCT_NAME /* 상품명*/ , T01.QUANTITY /* 수량*/ , T01.PRICE /* 가격*/ , T01.PRODUCT_STTS /* 판매상태*/ FROM PRODUCT_M T01
and T01.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%')
and T01.PRICE >= #{fromPrice} /* 시작가격만 있고 끝 가격은 없을경우*/
and T01.PRICE <= #{toPrice} /* 끝 가격만 있고 시작가격은 없을경우*/
and T01.PRICE BETWEEN #{fromPrice} AND #{toPrice}

SELECT T01.PRODUCT_NUM /* 상품번호*/ , T01.USER_NUM /* 등록사용자번호*/ , T01.PRODUCT_NAME /* 상품명*/ , T01.QUANTITY /* 수량*/ , T01.PRICE /* 가격*/ , T01.PRODUCT_STTS /* 판매상태*/ FROM PRODUCT_M T01 WHERE T01.PRODUCT_NUM = #{productNum}

SELECT T01.USER_NUM ,T01.ORDER_NUM ,T03.PRODUCT_NAME ,T03.PRODUCT_NUM ,T03.PRICE ,T02.QUANTITY AS ORDER_QUANTITY ,(T02.QUANTITY * T03.PRICE) TOTAL_PRICE ,TO_CHAR(T01.REGISTER_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') REGITSTER_DT ,T01.ORDER_STTS FROM ORDER_M T01 LEFT JOIN ORDER_PRODUCT T02 ON T01.ORDER_NUM = T02.ORDER_NUM LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_M T03 ON T02.PRODUCT_NUM = T03.PRODUCT_NUM
T01.USER_NUM = #{userNum} AND T03.PRODUCT_NAME IS NOT NULL
AND T03.PRODUCT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
